title: Jupiter is at its best and brightest of 2026 tonight! Here's what to expect as the gas giant reaches opposition
description: Jupiter reaches opposition overnight on Jan. 10, when it appears its brightest in 2026 opposite the sun in Earth's sky.
content: Jupiter reaches opposition overnight on Jan. 10, when it appears its brightest in 2026 opposite the sun in Earth's sky.
